Innovations And Creativity

Innovation Is What Sets Up Apart

The Foundation's Strategy Today Is Based On The Firm Belief That Solutions Innovation And Ideas Must Lead Our Business In All Areas From Start To Finish And Keep Up With Developments In The Challenges Of Building, so That We Can Always Provide Unique Solutions To Our Customers. We Are Creative In What We Offer, In Our Project, Our Technical Solutions, And The Management Of Our Site. This Allows Us To Strengthen The Flexible And Creative Devlopment Model In All Of Our Projects.

Innovation In The World Of Contracting

Terghazy Construction Foundation Seeks To Use The Latest Innovatons In Construction Contracting To Serve Its Customers And Here Are Some Of The Innovations That The Foundation Seeks To Introduce Into The Jordanian Labor Market In Various Fields In A New Concept Of A Comprehensive Approach To Sustainable Housing ANd With The Aim Of Forming A Better Life.

3D Construction

Creativity In Construction

3D Printing Is A Radical Change In The Traditional Way Of Building Models And Housing deasign. This Technology Makes It Possible To Create Complex Shapes And Reduce Production Times, Costs And Waste Reduce Heavy Manual Labor And Accidents.
3D Printing Holds Great Hope For The Future Of Construction. This Technology Is Used As Part Of A Digital Modeling Approach, And It Makes Rapid Strides Across The Construction Industry. It Can Push Back The Boundaries Of Construction, In Particular, Paving The Way For The Most Complex Architectural Forms.

The Main Goal Of Using 3D Technology

Low Environment Impact

This Process Is A Response To Environmental Issues. Reducing Significant Environmental Pollution, Reducing CO2 Emissions, Reducing Transportation, Less Harassment (Noise And Dust), ETC. According To A Study At The University Of Southern California, this Technology Could Reduce Carbon Dioxide And Gray Energy Emissions By 75% And 50% Repectively, Compared To The Conventional Process. These Results Should Be Seen In Light Of The Quality Of The Products, Which Should Remain the Same, And The Quality Level Of The Environment.

The Concept Of Comprehensive Construction

1-The Power Of Planning

Terghazi Contracting Derives Its Strength By Using Modern Minds ANd Technology And Harbessing It To Raise The Technical And Technical Level And Consider It A Vital Tool When Implementing ANd Studying Projects. The Advantages Of This Service Include:

Improved Time-Time Control Costs And Risks

Using The Power Of Planning We Offer Many Advantages And Operation: A Significant Reduction In Risk For Humans On Sites That Are Sometimes Difficult To Reach, ANd Improved Time And Associated Study Costs.

The Advantages Of Not Interrupting Production

We Do Studies And Tests And Test All Hypothesis And Methods For Implementing Projects In Populated Places, Whose Presence Requires Not Be Interrupted During The Implementation Of Maintainance And Construction Operations

Data Analysis: Real Added Values

Once The Data Acquisition Trips Are Carried Out, The Volume And Richness Of The Data Collected Requires In-Depth Analysis In Order To Provide The Appropriate Repoert On The State Of The Inspected Structure Of Energy And Services, Which Ensures A Detailed Analysis Of The Data, And Can Provide The Best Recommendations For Maintenance Plans For The Facilities, From Power Lines. To The Light Power Plants to The State Of The Architectural And Spirtual

Resistance To Challenges

Because The Planet's Resources Are Inexhaustible And The Health Risks Associated With Pollution Are Widspread, And Through the Follow-Up Of Global Studies And Improvment In The Construction Processes In The World, We Are Working Hard To Implement our Projects To Reduce The Human Impact On The Environment In The Framework Of Construction Such As SeeResidental Or Commercial Buildings. Our Desire To See Technology And Innovation Serves The Environment ANd Well-Being Of The Population

Citizens

Today's Citizens Have New Expectations And Want To Have Spaces Dedicated To Their Comfort. We Have Integrated Their Concerns Into The Design Process For The Development Of Housing That Promotes Well-Being And Interactions Among The Population. The Population Itself Plays A key Role In Ensuring The Autonomy Of The Building. Constantly Aware Of its Consumption, It Can Modify And Develop Forms Of Participation that Will Create Links Between People And Social Interaction.
